name: gridhealth
description: Enterprise system health monitoring solution with C# agent, Express server, and Next.js dashboard

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:server && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:server && npm run lint:dashboard
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:dashboard
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install
